front.title: IEEE Standard for the Electronic Reporting of Distribution Transformer Test Data

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: A basis for the electronic reporting of transformer test data on liquid immersed distribution transformers, as defined in the IEEE C57.12.2X, C57.12.3X, and C57.12.4X standards series, is provided in this standard. The specific set of test data to be reported, and the report format, is detailed along with an extended set of data as an option for the user.
